p: The oxidative limit ( E onset) was determined from the intersection of two linear regression lines ( R 2 > 0.99) of the background current and the faradaic oxidative current at a positive potential versus Li +/Li ( Figure 2 b) following the approach suggested by Asakura et al.( 11) It falls at about 2.3 V versus Li +/Li, which is in agreement with the values reported for LiBH 4 by Asakura et al.( 11) and Gulino et al.( 10) This result suggests that the addition of the MgO matrix only affects the ionic conductivity, leaving the electrochemical stability of LiBH 4 unchanged.
